ComicInfo.Summary:
Luiza saved the Mercury colony from the terrorist attack, but she has no time to enjoy her new found celebrity as a nightmare is unleashed. Some horrors are easier to kill than others. And soon she discovers that this fight is no bar brawl where she can punch her way out of trouble. This is something ancient and terrible that can't be reasoned with or dissuaded from perpetuating its misery. This is evil incarnate.
Available with Regular, Wraparound, Art Nouveau, and Excessive Force by series artist Nahuel Lopez.
